dt: {bc}a puzzle in which words are filled into a pattern of numbered squares in answer to correspondingly numbered clues and in such a way that the words read across and down

shortdef: a puzzle in which words are filled into a pattern of numbered squares in answer to correspondingly numbered clues and in such a way that the words read across and down

dt: {bc}a puzzle in which words that are the answers to clues are written into a pattern of numbered squares that go across and down

dt.t: My father does the {it}crossword puzzle{/it} every morning.

shortdef: a puzzle in which words that are the answers to clues are written into a pattern of numbered squares that go across and down
